channel.title: RS Wiki - Permission to add pages, categories
channel.description:
Allow us to add new pages to the RSWiki and add a new page to a category (like: https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=Category:RS2).
I wanted to add some 718 packets, but then I saw I couldn't.

item.title: RS Wiki - Permission to add pages, categories
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:12, topic:543608”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=662488.msg4429451#msg4429451 date=1402522278]
Damn it Arupham, we had a system in place you nerd
[/quote]suck my balls[/quote]

No need to be salty

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:9, topic:543608”]whoever is adding the wiki pages for packets that dont have actually have packet info and just one sentence about what it does needs to stop or at least add a tag to them, its impossible to tell which ones actually need the information[/quote]Arham seems to be doing that for the 718 protocol.

Read full topic

item.title: RS Wiki - Permission to add pages, categories
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:543608”]Thanks for that page sk8.

I did some, but can someone plz teach me how to get a packet’s type?
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=718_Protocol[/quote]By type we are referring to the packet size type. ie if the packet ALWAYS has the same size then you put FIXED, some others are ‘variable’ (ie subject to change) followed by the type (used to write the packet length), byte, short etc.

I don’t know why you don’t know this, if you even hope to contribute.

Read full topic

I did some, but can someone plz teach me how to get a packet’s type? Pure_ taught me. Thanks elder Pure.

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:1, topic:543608”]Allow us to add new pages to the RSWiki and add a new page to a category (like: https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=Category:RS2).

I wanted to add some 718 packets, but then I saw I couldn’t.[/quote]
You don’t add pages on there…
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=718_Protocol
inb4 I get banned.

Lolololol that was fast:

This user is currently blocked. The latest block log entry is provided below for reference: 22:22, 2 June 2014 Jmood (Talk | contribs) changed block settings for Sk8rdude461 (Talk | contribs) with an expiry time of Wed, 04 Jun 2014 03:21:53 GMT (autoblock disabled) (Intimidating behaviour/harassment: People cease and desist these actions. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,662488.msg4428020.html#msg4428020) View full log
Thnx jmood.

Read full topic
